comments:
Description:
IndexOutOfBoundsException when run and render report without multiple pages.

See ReportItemVisitor.link() method in EngineIRReader class.
Inner loop should use j instead of i.
I means masterPage.getHeader( j ) and masterPage.getFooter(j) instead of i.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Error log:
严重: Failed to get the report runnable
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 1, Size: 1
	at java.util.ArrayList.RangeCheck(ArrayList.java:507)
